mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO result_choice_tb ( score, question, a, b, c, d, correct, target, create_date, update_date, result_reading_id, result_id ) VALUES ( #{score}, #{question}, #{a}, #{b}, #{c}, #{d}, #{correct}, #{target}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{resultReadingId}, #{resultId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE result_choice_tb
score=#{score},
question=#{question},
a=#{a},
b=#{b},
c=#{c},
d=#{d},
correct=#{correct},
target=#{target},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate},
result_reading_id=#{resultReadingId},
result_id=#{resultId},
WHERE result_choice_id=#{resultChoiceId}
mapper.select: SELECT result_choice_id, score, question, a, b, c, d, correct, target, create_date, update_date, result_reading_id, result_id FROM result_choice_tb WHERE result_choice_id=#{resultChoiceId}
